item.title: ‘Degrassi: Whatever It Takes’ World Premiere Hits Legal Hurdle
item.description: Series co-creator Linda Schuyler has brought a notice of legal action against Lisa Rideout’s documentary, which for now is still set for a world premiere this weekend.
